Announcement in a brochure
This university is pleased to offer a certificate in technical writing. This certificate is intended to improve the technical writing skills of professionals who are already working as technical writers or for people who are interested in beginning a career as a technical writer.
The certificate program in technical writing is an intensive program that will prepare enrollees well to enter or advance in careers in technical writing. A minimum of 25 units is required to obtain the certificate. The eight-unit Introduction to Technical Writing is required of all students, and the rest of the 25 units required for this certificate can be completed by selecting courses from the list of approved elective courses.
Come start this program now, and you will be on your way to a successful career in technical writing!
